repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
* remove the implicit delete before prange, meaning that variables that are assigned within the prange can also be pre-initialized.
* remove the implicit delete before parallel (but not after, because `lastprivate` isn't allowed for `parallel`).
* remove the "assign an invalid value" mechanism in prange/parallel. It looks like the first iteration of this had some level of checking for the invalid value, but that was quickly dropped, and so it doesn't really actually do much. It just gets in the way of trying to pre-initialize variables. It also removes quite a bit coe.

commit.message: WIP on improving privates in prange
